items.content_html: This is simple game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.This game is a classic twist on the well know "Rock-Paper-Scissors" game. In this web based verssion user choose between three option: snake, water and gun, and computer play against palyers and the rule are Snake beats water, water beats gun and gun beats snake. its lightweight, easy to play.

items.content_html: The TinyEventBus is a minimalistic and lightweight event bus implementation in TypeScript/JavaScript. It provides a simple publish-subscribe mechanism, allowing for decoupled and asynchronous communication between different parts of an application.
